instructions: Always use conventional commit messages following the format: <type>(<scope>): <description>

Commit types: feat (new feature), fix (bug fix), docs (documentation), style (formatting), refactor (code restructuring), perf (performance), test (tests), build (build system), ci (CI config), chore (maintenance), revert (revert commit)
Use sentence case for the description (capitalize first letter)
Examples: 'feat: Add user authentication', 'fix(api): Resolve token refresh issue', 'docs: Update README with setup instructions'
When changes are done, build with docker. If builds are successful commit changes
After committing, push to remote to trigger CI/CD pipeline
